description: This file provides functions to build WebSocket URLs and connect/disconnect to a WebSocket stream for ping monitoring, including event handling and URL construction logic.

methods.name: buildWsUrl(sessionId)
methods.description: Constructs the WebSocket URL based on session ID, environment variables, and current window location.

methods.name: connectPingStream({ sessionId, onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError })
methods.description: Establishes a WebSocket connection for ping streams, sets up event handlers, and returns the socket and disconnect function.

ctags.name: connectPingStream
ctags.pattern: /^export function connectPingStream({ sessionId, onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError }) {$/
